Text:
I would ignore all these Winmount torrents.  You should just get a genuine one off the net.  It goes on working for ever, and it's free.  

You just get a nag screen each time it is opened, urging you to buy it after the 15-day trial, or to remove it from your computer.  But you can happily just ignore this nag and it still works with no restrictions beyond the 15-day trial.

I've had mine for 6 months now, and it's working fine.
